text: You wake up in your cottage in finland. You weren't able to save stalburg. A meltdown happened.
You pick up your phone. Your boss is worried about you. He asks how you are recovering. He also offers you a job if you want to come to stalburg one day.

Thank you for playing Infra Text Adventure REBOOTED!

Developer - eetnaviation
Original idea: ThePiGuy24
